card.description: The game plan for the November 8, 2022 steal is in play.
card.title: The Games Begin For The 2022 Steal

_source.content: https://andmagazine.substack.com/p/the-games-begin-for-the-2022-steal?utm_source=email The current news cycle provides a glimpse into the games to be played by the Democrats to steal the 2022 election. With their base crumbling day by day, their only hope at this point is to register as many new liberals as they can before the close of registration for the November 8, 2022 election. And note, I did not say anything about “eligible but unregistered” voters. That technique was used as part of Obama’s geeks’ plan in 2020, implemented with the assistance of the Electronic Registration Information Center (ERIC), the Center for Election Innovation and Research (CEIR), the Center for Technology and Civic Life (CTCL), and the newly released 2020 census information. This year will be about registering illegal immigrants.
_source.contentraw:
https://andmagazine.substack.com/p/the-games-begin-for-the-2022-steal?utm_source=email

group.description:
What a great way to start your day. Say good morning to your gab family here so that your "good morning" posts are in one place, easy to find. 
Moderation is turned on. Posts that appear to be spam will require moderator approval. First posts from new members will also require approval.
Remember: Gab's promise of legal free-speech is always only one click away. While you're in this group, please follow the guidelines.
1. Please post in English. 
2. No solicitations of funds. 
3. No selling of products or services. 
4. Don't promote your group while you are in my group.
5. No blatant political posts; avoid mentioning political parties or ideologies.
6. No purely or primarily religious posts and no religious verses.
7. Not more than two or three posts per day; and not at the same time. 
8. Please do not use the "Quote" feature on a post that is inside this group, when a "comment" on the original post is possible.
9. Please do not include multiple member @ names in your original post or add additional @ names to your comments. 
10. Vulgar language or images and controversial subjects designed to spur argument are unwelcome.

Posts that do not follow the guidelines, or otherwise seem inappropriate for the group, will be removed from the group. Depending upon circumstances, offenders may be banned from the group. 
Each guideline has a reason behind it, and is intended to keep this group a place for friendly exchanges between members. As part of your greeting, family-friendly photos, videos, GIFs, links, short stories about your morning, your day, or your life are all welcome. 
Let’s keep the "Good Morning" Brigade, the friendliest place on the internet.
group.description_html:
What a great way to start your day. Say good morning to your gab family here so that your "good morning" posts are in one place, easy to find.
Moderation is turned on. Posts that appear to be spam will require moderator approval. First posts from new members will also require approval.
Remember: Gab's promise of legal free-speech is always only one click away. While you're in this group, please follow the guidelines.

  1. Please post in English.
  2. No solicitations of funds.
  3. No selling of products or services.
  4. Don't promote your group while you are in my group.
  5. No blatant political posts; avoid mentioning political parties or ideologies.
  6. No purely or primarily religious posts and no religious verses.
  7. Not more than two or three posts per day; and not at the same time.
  8. Please do not use the "Quote" feature on a post that is inside this group, when a "comment" on the original post is possible.
  9. Please do not include multiple member @ names in your original post or add additional @ names to your comments.
  10. Vulgar language or images and controversial subjects designed to spur argument are unwelcome.

Posts that do not follow the guidelines, or otherwise seem inappropriate for the group, will be removed from the group. Depending upon circumstances, offenders may be banned from the group.
Each guideline has a reason behind it, and is intended to keep this group a place for friendly exchanges between members. As part of your greeting, family-friendly photos, videos, GIFs, links, short stories about your morning, your day, or your life are all welcome.
Let’s keep the "Good Morning" Brigade, the friendliest place on the internet.

card.title: Rudy Giuliani: Adams is a worse mayor than De Blasio, says media has a "love affair" with Adams

_source.content: Rudy Giuliani: Adams is a worse mayor than De Blasio, says media has a "love affair" with AdamsJul 8, 2022Newsmax TVhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YoQflFYBZpMOn Friday's "Rob Schmitt Tonight," former New York City mayor Rudy Giuliani RIPS current mayor Eric Adams for being "a worse mayor than [Bill] De Blasio" and blasts New York's Governor and District Attorney for being weak on crime.
_source.contentraw:
Rudy Giuliani: Adams is a worse mayor than De Blasio, says media has a "love affair" with Adams
Jul 8, 2022

Newsmax TV
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YoQflFYBZpM

On Friday's "Rob Schmitt Tonight," former New York City mayor Rudy Giuliani RIPS current mayor Eric Adams for being "a worse mayor than [Bill] De Blasio" and blasts New York's Governor and District Attorney for being weak on crime.

account.note: I'm sorry if this disappoints some of you, but I don't automatically "follow back" my followers. If you post original and thoughtful content, I may "follow back". But if what you do is mostly just "Repost", then probably not.

card.description: Using special equipment, a photographer was able to create a time-lapse video showing the Earth’s rotation.
card.title: Incredible Time-Lapse Stabilized Video Demonstrates Earth’s Rotation [Watch]

_source.content: Using special equipment, a photographer was able to create a time-lapse video showing the Earth’s rotation. The video is set against a backdrop of the Milky Way galaxy and its band of stars.The video was made by photographer Eric Brummel from San Francisco. It was recorded at Font’s Point in California’s Anza-Borrego Desert. The short clip features time-lapse footage of the desert landscape as the Earth rotates against a brightly-lit sky.https://www.ibtimes.com/incredible-time-lapse-stabilized-video-demonstrates-earths-rotation-watch-2892081
_source.contentraw:
Using special equipment, a photographer was able to create a time-lapse video showing the Earth’s rotation. The video is set against a backdrop of the Milky Way galaxy and its band of stars.

The video was made by photographer Eric Brummel from San Francisco. It was recorded at Font’s Point in California’s Anza-Borrego Desert. The short clip features time-lapse footage of the desert landscape as the Earth rotates against a brightly-lit sky.

https://www.ibtimes.com/incredible-time-lapse-stabilized-video-demonstrates-earths-rotation-watch-2892081

group.description: - - - WARNING - - - this group may cause original thoughts to develop and have you questioning your programmed and indoctrinated thinking.Throughout all of history man has always known our Earth was Level and Stationary, until #FakeNewsMedia and gov't education. We were fed a well-packaged web of lies, gradually over several generations, taking our beliefs further and further from our True Earth. When we were to young to think for ourselves, they brainwashed society with false beliefs.All of our oceans and lakes do actually survey and measure perfectly FLAT, no Curvature has ever been found or measured. Our Level Earth is Stationary, no instrument known to man has ever detected any motion on Earth, only Earth quakes. Every single Star ever seen, from anywhere on Earth, can be seen every night of the year. Not one star ever leaves the view from Earth, how could that be true if Earth orbited the Sun ? FACTS do not cease to exist, just because they are ignored.Some may ask to see an edge, why must there be an edge ? Antarctica is not a southern continent, rather it's an encircling ice wall that forms a barrier. The "Antarctic Treaty" prohibits all private research. Why do they hide Antarctica from us, other lands beyond Antarctica ?This group is family friendly, act accordingly (language). Accounts set to 'Private', dis-info shills, controlled opposition, alt accounts, ban evaders and proven liars, may be removed. Accounts who rudely take over feeds, ignoring or changing topic, engaging in threats or insults, may be removed. We report spammers.This group has never, and will never, ask for a dime from anyone. The ONLY purpose for this group is to reveal the multitudes of facts with undeniable evidence evoking our true Level and Stationary Earth Plane. Truth is like a breath of fresh air, Truth will break you free from the Echo Chamber of Deception.

_source.plainmarkdown:
**Using special equipment, a photographer was able to create a time-lapse video showing the Earth’s rotation.** The video is set against a backdrop of the Milky Way galaxy and its band of stars.

The video was made by photographer Eric Brummel from San Francisco. It was recorded at Font’s Point in California’s Anza-Borrego Desert. The short clip features time-lapse footage of the desert landscape as the Earth rotates against a brightly-lit sky.

https://www.ibtimes.com/incredible-time-lapse-stabilized-video-demonstrates-earths-rotation-watch-2892081

card.description: Viruses evolve, and vaccines should too. That was the big-picture takeaway from a pivotal meeting this week of the FDA’s expert advisory panel. The question before them was simple: Ahead of an expected winter surge, should vaccine manufacturers tweak their forthcoming booster shots to target Omicron, or should they stick with the tried-and-true 2020 recipe?
card.title: 'The worst version' of COVID is spreading. Can we update our vaccines in time?

_source.content: ...but notice in this fakestream media story how they gloss over the fact that their own jabs that did nothing to prevent infection and transmission, IN FACT, TRAINED the virus to ESCAPE the body's immune system, while also DAMAGING the body's defenses against viral infection!!!Dr. Eric Topol, et al, Continue to Push for Omicron Vaccine“But combined with waning vaccine protection and disappointing booster uptake among the elderly, the virus’s accelerating evolution and aggressive new trajectory — toward greater transmissibility, evasiveness and possibly pathogenicity — could cause significant reinfections and disruptions if not addressed.”https://news.yahoo.com/the-worst-version-of-covid-is-spreading-can-we-update-our-vaccines-in-time-131933423.html

card.description: (Institut für Islamfragen, dk, 03.09.2021) Eric Patterson, der geschäftsführende Stellvertretende Präsident des Religious Freedom Institute (Washington DC), berichtete am 3. September 2021 auf der Website des Instituts über die Krise in Afghanistan, insbesondere über die Not der verfolgten Christen in Afghanistan.
card.title: Afghanistan: Lage der Konvertiten zum Christentum besonders dramatisch - Institut für Islamfragen

_source.content: Nicht nur sie, sondern auch ihre Familien leiden Verfolgung und Tod(Institut für Islamfragen, dk, 03.09.2021) Eric Patterson. Er betonte, dass der amerikanische Rückzugstermin des 31. August ein künstlich gewähltes Datum gewesen sei. Man hätte dadurch den Taliban in die Hände gespielt. Es gäbe heute zwischen 10.000 bis 18.000 Christen in Afghanistan, fast alle Konvertiten vom Islam zum christlichen Glauben.Jeden Tag gäbe es christliche Märtyrer. Sie würden nicht nur einfach getötet, sondern viele würden gefoltert, enthauptet und ihre Familien würden wegen ihres Glaubens an Jesus Christus alles verlieren. Was denkt ihr, wie es den Christen hier geht, die die Impfung überleben, Wir werden in der Minderzahl sein. Heute der Bericht Reitschuster: 82 Prozent der Covid-Intensivpatienten vollständig geimpft. Intensiv bedeutet schwer erkrankt. googelt Leute und erkennt die Zusammenhänge.  https://www.islaminstitut.de/2021/afghanistan-lage-der-konvertiten-zum-christentum-besonders-dramatisch/

group.description: Seit im Mai 1832 zum ersten Mal die schwarz-rot-goldene Fahne auf dem Kastanienberg bei Neustadt wehte, gilt das Hambacher Schloss als Wiege der deutschen Demokratie. Am Hambacher Fest 1832 nahmen 30.000 Menschen teil, um dort ihre Forderungen nach Einheit und Freiheit auszurufen.

_source.content: "So what will be the most beneficial way to heal yourselves? I would say that it would be to take a nice long bath in a pool of love. The love will enter your spaces. It will enter your wounded emotional body and heal you. You have very many concepts around the term and experience of love. Truly it is an experience and not something you can understand. Each of you have done many crazy things in the name of love, have you not? Things which you ordinarily would find completely illogical. You will jump at the chance to perform if there is some love at the end of that experience. So I will tell you that there is a great deal of love at the end of this ascension experience. And let this be the carrot at the end of the stick for some of you. You have been seeking this experience intensely. There is so much love that is waiting to surround you. There is so much that it is an experience of bliss. I would say that bliss is the experience of having too much love. In your third dimensional reality, you probably cannot conceive of having too much love. But it is possible and you will experience it. Perhaps you will even ask us to turn down the juice a little bit, believe it or not. For love can be very explosive. It can be very expanding. It has a tendency to melt the boundaries of your limited identity to the point where you feel a oneness or merging with all of creation. And you will all experience this. This is an aspect of where you are headed. This is integral to the ascension process. ...So if you are feeling that you cannot possibly open to such a high degree of love, sharing, and giving and openness – if you feel that you are not a particularly open individual. This is a belief which must be eradicated. These beliefs will trip you up in your ability to bathe in that pool of love. All that is required … it is not a matter of deserving; it is a matter of being outrageous enough to take the leap into it. It is there. The pool of love is there within you. Most of you have withheld from yourselves this experience because your programming told you that you did not deserve it, or it had to come in a certain package or a certain relationship. I am here to tell you that you need not be in a relationship to experience the depths of love. A relationship can mirror your experience but it cannot in itself take you to the depths. You yourself must provide the outrageous behavior of leaping into the pool of love.”Sananda, through Eric KleinThe Crystal Stair; A Guide to the Ascension
_source.contentraw:
"So what will be the most beneficial way to heal yourselves? I would say that it would be to take a nice long bath in a pool of love. The love will enter your spaces. It will enter your wounded emotional body and heal you. You have very many concepts around the term and experience of love. Truly it is an experience and not something you can understand.

Each of you have done many crazy things in the name of love, have you not? Things which you ordinarily would find completely illogical. You will jump at the chance to perform if there is some love at the end of that experience. So I will tell you that there is a great deal of love at the end of this ascension experience. And let this be the carrot at the end of the stick for some of you.

You have been seeking this experience intensely. There is so much love that is waiting to surround you. There is so much that it is an experience of bliss. I would say that bliss is the experience of having too much love. In your third dimensional reality, you probably cannot conceive of having too much love. But it is possible and you will experience it. Perhaps you will even ask us to turn down the juice a little bit, believe it or not. For love can be very explosive. It can be very expanding. It has a tendency to melt the boundaries of your limited identity to the point where you feel a oneness or merging with all of creation. And you will all experience this. This is an aspect of where you are headed. This is integral to the ascension process.

...So if you are feeling that you cannot possibly open to such a high degree of love, sharing, and giving and openness – if you feel that you are not a particularly open individual. This is a belief which must be eradicated. These beliefs will trip you up in your ability to bathe in that pool of love.

All that is required … it is not a matter of deserving; it is a matter of being outrageous enough to take the leap into it. It is there. The pool of love is there within you. Most of you have withheld from yourselves this experience because your programming told you that you did not deserve it, or it had to come in a certain package or a certain relationship. I am here to tell you that you need not be in a relationship to experience the depths of love. A relationship can mirror your experience but it cannot in itself take you to the depths. You yourself must provide the outrageous behavior of leaping into the pool of love.”

Sananda, through Eric Klein
The Crystal Stair; A Guide to the Ascension
